channel.description: Recommended Configuration This section will address a few mistakes new mesh users might make. Please do not enable MQTT Downlink on the default LongFast Channel this will flood our local mesh with hundreds of nodes in different countries. Please do not set your message hop limit more than 4 hops. Please keep communications on the default channel clean as many schools are also experimenting with Meshtastic.
